com.revolsys.ui.html.serializer.key
Interface KeySerializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
BooleanYesNoKeySerializer, BuilderMethodLocaleSerializer, BuilderMethodSerializer, DateFormatKeySerializer, DateKeySerializer, DateTimeKeySerializer, EmailKeySerializer, MoneyKeySerializer, PercentKeySerializer, PhoneNumberKeySerializer, TimestampKeySerializer, UrlKeySerializer
public interface KeySerializer

The ObjectSerializer interface defines a method to serailize an object to an XmlWriter.

Author:
Paul Austin

Method Summary
 void serialize(XmlWriter out, Object value, String key, Locale locale)
          Serialize the value to the XML writer using the settings from the Locale.
 

Method Detail

serialize

void serialize(XmlWriter out,
               Object value,
               String key,
               Locale locale)
Serialize the value to the XML writer using the settings from the Locale.

Parameters:
out - The XML writer to serialize to.
value - The object to get the value from.
key - The key of the property on the object to serialize.
locale - The locale.
Throws:
IOException - If there was an I/O error serializing the value.
